block.p: Laura Barbara O'Neill, a daughter of Barbara Pecora O'Neill and Thomas H. O'Neill Jr., both of Buffalo, was married yesterday to Donald Joseph Donofrio, a son of Cecilia Donofrio and Donald John Donofrio of Rockaway, N.J. The Rev. James P. Higgins performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at St. Joseph's Cathedral in Buffalo.

Mrs. Donofrio, 32, is the senior picture editor at People.com, the online version of People magazine, in New York. She and the bridegroom graduated from the Rochester Institute of Technology. Her father is the chairman of two oil companies, Union Drilling in Pittsburgh and the Somerset Exploration Corporation in Indiana, Pa.

Laura Barbara O'Neill, a daughter of Barbara Pecora O'Neill and Thomas H. O'Neill Jr., both of Buffalo, was married yesterday to Donald Joseph Donofrio, a son of Cecilia Donofrio and Donald John Donofrio of Rockaway, N.J. The Rev. James P. Higgins performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at St. Joseph's Cathedral in Buffalo.

Mrs. Donofrio, 32, is the senior picture editor at People.com, the online version of People magazine, in New York. She and the bridegroom graduated from the Rochester Institute of Technology. Her father is the chairman of two oil companies, Union Drilling in Pittsburgh and the Somerset Exploration Corporation in Indiana, Pa.

Mr. Donofrio, 33, is an assistant to the editor on the newsroom technology staff of The New York Times. His mother is an accounts-payable clerk at the Morris County School of Technology in Denville, N.J. His father restores classic and antique farm and construction equipment in Rockaway.
